name: VRSE Batman
description:
The Joker™ has brought chaos and villainy to Gotham City™, and it is up to Batman™ to stop this dangerous new threat. Stalk your enemies from the shadows, use the Batarang™ to take down The Joker's henchmen or get up close and engage in intense hand-to-hand combat. Do you have what it takes to master Batman's skills and save Gotham City?

Batman™ VRSE™ VR Entertainment System is required to play. Product comes with VR Headset, Bluetooth Motion Game Controller and Batarang™ attachment. Available at all major retailers.
